name: あさひ
text:
ねぇねぇ、愛依ちゃんはこの水着
どう思うっすか？
trans:
Hey-hey Mei-chan, 
What do you think of this swimsuit?

name: 愛依
text: えぇ？　い、いいと思う……けど
trans: Huh? I think it's good...

name: あさひ
text: あー！　ちゃんと聞いてないっす！
trans: Hey! You're not listenin'!

name: 愛依
text:
ちょ、聞くから
このページ見終わるまで待つし──
trans:
Hold on, I'll listen. 
Wait until I'm done looking at this page...

name: 愛依
text: うわ……こんなすんの……
trans: Ugh... this much...

name: 愛依
text:
えぇ～……これもたっか！
うち、詰んでね……？
trans:
Eh～... this one's pricey too! 
Should I give up...?

name: 冬優子
text: ……何よ、暗い声して
trans: ...What are you grumbling about?

name: 愛依
text: ……それ聞いちゃう？
trans: ...Will you hear me out?

name: 冬優子
text: 別に、そんな興味ないけど
trans: Not really. I'm not that interested.

name: 愛依
text:
ちょ、そりゃなくない！？
フツー聞くっしょ、今の流れ
trans:
Wha──, that's how you respond!? 
People typically lend an ear at a time like this.

name: 冬優子
text:
……はいはい……
……で、どうしたの？
trans:
...Fine fine... 
...So, what's wrong?

name: 愛依
text: お金……ないんだよね
trans: I don't... have money.

name: 冬優子
trans: Huh...?

name: 愛依
text:
今月、遊びすぎちゃってさ～！
もう小遣いピンチ！　的なやつ！
trans:
I went out too much this month! 
I'm having, like, allowance troubles!

name: 愛依
text:
で、これ見てたら水着って結構するじゃん！
うちどうしたらいいの～？
trans:
So, the swimsuits I'm looking at are kinda a lot!
What do I do～?

name: 冬優子
text:
……あんた、さっきのあいつの話
聞いてなかったわけ？
trans: ...You weren't listening to what he was saying earlier, were you?

name: 愛依
text: え？
trans: Eh?

name: 冬優子
text: 水着は全員分、経費で落ちるって言ってたでしょ
trans: He was saying that the expenses of each of our swimsuits will be covered.

name: 愛依
trans: ...Expenses...?

name: 冬優子
text:
……
仕事で使うものだから事務所がお金出してくれんのよ……
trans: ...It's something we're using for work, so the company will pay for it...

name: 愛依
text:
マジで！　タダで新しいの買えるとか神じゃん！
どんなのにしよっ──
trans:
Seriously?!  Sweet, I can buy a new one!
Which one shall I pick──

name: あさひ
text: ──おぉ……こんな水着もあるんだ……
trans: ──Oh... I've never seen a swimsuit like this before...

name: 愛依
text: ！　どしたん？
trans: ! Which one?

name: あさひ
text: これっすよこれ！
trans: This! This one!

name: あさひ
text: ほとんど紐っす！
trans: It's nearly all string!

name: あさひ
text:
どうなってるのか知りたいっす！
近くで売ってないっすかね～……
trans:
I wanna know what it's like! 
D'you think they sell any nearby?～

name: 愛依
text:
えぇ～、これ着てみたいの？
ないっしょ～
trans:
Eh～, you wanna try this on? 
No way～

name: あさひ
text:
なんでっすか！
こんなに面白そうなのに！
trans:
Why not!
Something like this seems fun!

name: 愛依
text:
見てるぶんにはいいけどさ～
自分で着るってなると、色々きついっしょこれは
trans:
Looking at it might be fun, 
But if you're wearing it yourself it'd be intense in a lot of ways.

name: 愛依
text: それよりほら、こっちのワンショルダー、ちょー良くない？
trans: More importantly, isn't this single shoulder one fine?

name: あさひ
text: ……うーん……

name: あさひ
text: 普通すぎてつまんないっす！
trans: It's so plain it's boring!

name: 愛依
text:
いや、可愛いって～
そだ！　冬優子ちゃんはどう思う、これ？
trans:
Nah, it's cute～. 
Oh! Fuyuko-chan, what do you think of this?

name: 冬優子
text: ったく……落ち着いて選びたいってのに……
trans: Jeez. And I wanted to be left alone to pick one...

name: 冬優子
text: 悪くないじゃない
trans: Not bad.

name: 愛依
text: でしょ～！　どーよ、あさひちゃん！
trans: Right～! How's that, Asahi-chan!

name: あさひ
text: む～
trans: Hmph...

name: 冬優子
text: あんたにしては、まともなチョイスして──
trans: An acceptable choice for you would──

name: 冬優子
text: ──って、これ10万！？
trans: ──Wait, is this ¥100,000!?

name: 愛依
text: え？　『けーひ』じゃないの？
trans: Huh? Isn't this an "expense"?

name: 冬優子
text:
限度ってもんがあるでしょ！？
こんなん無理に決まって──
trans:
Ever heard of limits!? 
Don't be unreasonable and pick──

name: あさひ
text:
──ダメじゃないっすか！
それならやっぱりわたしの──
trans:
──You can't do that!
In that case, mine is──

name: 冬優子
text: あんたのもあり得ない！
trans: Yours is going too far too!

name: あさひ
text: えぇ～、冬優子ちゃんまで～！
trans: Eh～, Fuyuko-chan～!

name: あさひ
text: 決めた！
trans: I got it!

name: 愛依
text: ちょ、あさひちゃん！
trans: Hey, Asahi-chan!

name: あさひ
text: 実物、買ってきてふたりに見せるっすよ！
trans: I'll buy one, and show it off to you two!

name: 愛依
text: 行っちゃった……
trans: She ran out...

name: 愛依
text: ……うちも行こ！
trans: ...I'm coming too!

name: 愛依
text: あさひちゃんに色々着せたら面白そうだし♪
trans: It'll be fun to have Asahi-chan try on a bunch of swimsuits♪

name: 冬優子
text: やっと静かになったわね……
trans: Finally quiet around here......

name: 冬優子
trans: .....What?

name: 愛依
text: 何してんの～、早く行くよ～
trans: What are you waiting for～, we're heading out soon～

name: 冬優子
text:
あんたたちと行ったら
買い物どころじゃなさそうだから、遠慮しとく
trans:
With you two involved,
We probably won't be going to any stores. So I'll decline.

name: 愛依
text: あさひちゃんの着せ替え、見なくていいの？
trans: You sure you don't want to dress-up Asahi-chan?

name: 冬優子
text:
あいつのお守りはあんたに任せるわよ
ちゃんと常識の範囲内で買ってきなさい
trans:
I'll leave the babysitting job to you. 
Make sure to only buy something that is within the realms of common sense.

name: 冬優子
text: ふぅ……
trans: *Sigh*...

name: 冬優子
text: あ～、これでゆっくり探せる
trans: Ah～, now I can look at my own pace.
